title: Among The Sleep (1.10 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest patch for "Among the sleep" This is the 1.10 patch only. This does not include the full game. This patch only works for the gog version of the game. If you want the gog version of "Among the sleep". The torrent link is below.

----------------

Among the Sleep (1.10 Patch Notes)


Changelog: 

General 

- An option to hide the crosshair dot has been added 

- Added fast-forward option to credits. This can be activated by using 

standard movement keys/gamepad buttons 

- Fixed hints and subtitles sometimes being completely black 

- Fixed look-at-hands animation playing if opening the menu while sliding 

- Made rotating cranks and valves significantly easier 

- Made the long drawer a lot more stable 

- Fixed several locations where geometry would disappear when it 
shouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t (Occlusion culling) 

- Fixed bug where animation for climbing last pipe in closet level 
started too late 

- Fixed timing on some events 

- Added collision to some bottles in cabinets in the home level 

- Updated version of AI middleware (RAIN) 

- Fixed an issue where Teddy could block the player in the home level 

- Improved sound in certain areas of the game 

Virtual Reality 

- Resolution selection in VR mode has been unlocked 

- Fixed an issue where multiple cursors were shown in the main 
menu/in-game menu in VR mode 

- Added a configurable key binding for resetting VR device orientation 

- Mother and cake now have correct collision in the intro, which fixed 
wrong depth on VR cursor 

-------------------
